module.name: VoiceMail Blasting
module.description: Creates a group of extensions that Calls a group of voicemail boxes and allows you to leave a Msg for them all at once.
module.changelog: *1.1.0* add audio label, password protect, fix bug for javascript validation to work, add extension/dest registry support *1.0.2* increase grouplist field to varchar(255) to increase the vmblast list *1.0.l* fix: context, redisplay of groups, get proper vm contexts, beep before leaving msg
